title: Medium fries and a large soda

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Seance with an alive player while dead, you have a private chat with them next day. (1 use)
- Eat your fries, gain basic defense.
- Drink your soda, stay energetic and see all your visitors this night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may talk with the dead at night.
